author: Zamwa Ahmed
comment: Love the face one of the gorgeous faces.though the animation is a bit slow as well as response of touches.

reply.author: Darkle
reply.content:
Thank you for the positive comment !
I add that in the description too :
if you use animations, then for smoother animation Watchmaker settings should be :
(icon top left) Settings -> Watch -> Max Frame Rate = 50

title: Love it well done.
